translations: er hat mich heute an seiner Stelle hergeschickt

tokens.value: ʻer hat mich heute an seiner Stelle hergeschicktʼ

Preterit.text: mtarásle-li ádyawma b-dukṯe d-ruḥe ʻer hat mich heute an seiner Stelle hergeschicktʼ; 159; 60/163;

Preterit.turoyo: qayəm hano Mḥammaye Elo məḷḷe l-am=Mədwoye baxti alxu ṭr=oṯən u=săwāl-aṯxu sīdan w-diḏan oṯən sīdayxu mede bayn elan w-alxu layt mətyaqanne qayimi mṭaraṣṣe u=săwāl-aṯṯe l-u=ḥdud d-bayn alle w-l- Mḥammaye Elo -
translations: ‘Mḥammaye Elo said to the inhabitants of Midin: “You have my word. Let your cattle come to us, and let ours come to you. There is nothing (bad) between you and us”. – And they believed him and sent their cattle to the border between them and Mḥammaye Elo’

tokens.value: qayəm hano Mḥammaye Elo məḷḷe l-am=Mədwoye baxti alxu ṭr=oṯən u=săwāl-aṯxu sīdan w-diḏan oṯən sīdayxu mede bayn elan w-alxu layt mətyaqanne qayimi mṭaraṣṣe u=săwāl-aṯṯe l-u=ḥdud d-bayn alle w-l- Mḥammaye Elo

‘Mḥammaye Elo said to the inhabitants of Midin: “You have my word. Let your cattle come to us, and let ours come to you. There is nothing (bad) between you and us”. – And they believed him and sent their cattle to the border between them and Mḥammaye Elo’

Preterit.text: qayəm hano Mḥammaye Elo məḷḷe l-am=Mədwoye baxti alxu ṭr=oṯən u=săwāl-aṯxu sīdan w-diḏan oṯən sīdayxu mede bayn elan w-alxu layt mətyaqanne qayimi mṭaraṣṣe u=săwāl-aṯṯe l-u=ḥdud d-bayn alle w-l- Mḥammaye Elo ‘Mḥammaye Elo said to the inhabitants of Midin: “You have my word. Let your cattle come to us, and let ours come to you. There is nothing (bad) between you and us”. – And they believed him and sent their cattle to the border between them and Mḥammaye Elo’ 85/7-8;

Infectum.turoyo: mtarasn-a aʕmux Пример отсутствует в указанном месте
Infectum.text: mtarasn-a aʕmux; 167; 62/301; Пример отсутствует в указанном месте

translations: Gott hat mir nie viel Glücksgüter geschickt

tokens.value: ʻGott hat mir nie viel Glücksgüter geschicktʼ

Infectum-wa.text: aloho lə=mtarás-way-li năṣīb ġắlabe ʻGott hat mir nie viel Glücksgüter geschicktʼ; 168; 60/43;
